channel.title: Uploading RsPs to Megaupload, RapidShare ect
channel.description: I finished my server so now i want people to be able to play it using my client... What do i do?

item.title: Uploading RsPs to Megaupload, RapidShare ect
item.dc:creator: @teufel teufel
item.description:

Its ight happens to all of us lol w8 wat do you mean by change ip?

item.title: Uploading RsPs to Megaupload, RapidShare ect
item.dc:creator: @jal_knight jal knight
item.description:
@jal_knight wrote:

wow, im sorry dont put the source in a .rar put the client in the .rar, sorry i was drinking earlier and i went back to see what i told everyone and this is another mistake i found i told someone not to do.

lol ok the real instructions, put the client in a .rar, upload it than ppl will download it and play on your server, make sure you changed the ip address in the client.java, on the client side if not than ppl wont be able to connect to your server.
Sorry about earlier

Read full topic
item.source: Uploading RsPs to Megaupload, RapidShare ect

item.source: Uploading RsPs to Megaupload, RapidShare ect

item.title: Uploading RsPs to Megaupload, RapidShare ect
item.dc:creator: @jal_knight jal knight
item.description:
@jal_knight wrote:

put the source into a .rar than upload it to rapidshare or whatever you would like to use, when you register your server put in the description the link to your rapidshare or whatever account, when your server is posted and people start to see it they will go to the link and download. Good luck!

Read full topic
